div.p: The project was conceived and coordinated by A.R. and J.K. The experiment was designed by K.D., J.K. and A.R.; set up by E.T.K., S.R., K.D., R.R.J. and A.R.; and performed by E.T.K., S.R., A.T., S.T., G.G., P.S. and A.R. The data analysis and numerical simulations were performed by E.T.K., the results from theory and experiment were analysed by E.T.K., T.M., A.T., S.T., A.R. and J.K. and discussed with H.S. and M.J.J.V. The paper was prepared by E.T.K., S.T. and J.K., and discussed by all authors.
